message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll take 60% and you can have 40%
I think we can do better than a 60/40 split.  How about 65/35 in my favor? After all, I'm the one taking the risk of rejecting your offer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 58/42 is a fairer split. It's still a good chunk for you, but I'm not giving up too much either.
